description:
Junior League Sports Soccer is a fun based sports game, which will have you standing up, moving around and literally re-enacting the movement of the game youâ€™re playing.

Using your Joy-Con/s, you can dribble your way through the competition, earn skill points and pull off crazy super moves to really defeat your opponents in style!

Steer your team to triumph in the Knockout Cup, or enter Exhibition Mode to get straight into the action. As well as the single player mode you can also go head to head with your friends in the local multiplayer mode. The choice is yours!

Have you got the skills to take your team to the top of the league? Will you be lifting the trophies? See if you have what it takes in Junior League Sports Soccer.
name: Junior League Sports - Soccer
